name: I Dreamt Of a Garden On the Moon
name_original: I Dreamt Of a Garden On the Moon
description:
Controls

D-Pad (arrow keys or WASD): Move
A (X or period): Plant seeds
B (Z or comma): Harvest seeds
Start (Enter): Start game
Select (Shift): Select seeds

Notes
  • Made for GBJam 10 (theme: plant/plants)
  • Audio was recorded from a gameboy color running lsdj
  • The color theme is "mist gb" by Kerrie Lake: https://lospec.com/palette-list/mist-gb
